title: Stock Markets Reach New Heights Amid Geopolitical and Economic Shifts
description: Major stock indexes, including the Dow Jones, reached record highs as investors focused on key market data. Geopolitical tension from Venezuela was countered by optimism in artificial intelligence, thereby driving financial momentum. Meanwhile, the U.S. dollar and oil prices fluctuated due to varying global factors.

title: $1B OpenAI IP Suit Targets Disney Licensing Deal Details
description: In a legal clash that could redraw the borders of artificial intelligence and copyright law, bestselling authors suing OpenAI are asking a federal judge to force the company to open the books on its $1 billion licensing deal with Disney, arguing the agreement may undercut OpenAI’s fair-use defense.
